aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.intro: Hello! I'm a passionate developer and designer with a focus on creating intuitive and engaging user experiences.
aboutMe.experience: With several years of experience in the industry, I've worked on a variety of projects ranging from web applications to mobile apps and design systems.
aboutMe.skills: My skill set includes front-end development, UI/UX design, and a strong understanding of user-centered design principles.

background.title: Background
background.content: I started my journey in technology with a curiosity about how digital products are built. Over the years, I've developed a deep appreciation for the intersection of design and development, where functionality meets aesthetics.

interests.title: Interests & Hobbies
interests.content: Outside of work, I enjoy photography, hiking, and exploring new technologies. I'm also an avid reader and enjoy participating in design and development communities.
